THE MERMAIDS—A teacher joins a team of rebels determined to overthrow and kill a powerful mermaid queen! The script, pencils, inks, colors, letters and covers are all 100% done!  The ALL-NEW full color comic, 48 pages, ships April 2021!   Look Inside The 100% Completed Book Here: Script by: MJ Negueruela & Stefan Petrucha   Interior Art by: David Lorenzo and Esther SanzCovers and designs by Gerry Gertrudia  and two special covers by Javier ArandaInterior art by David Lorenzo & Esther Sanz with color design by JayJay Jackson​ '          THE MERMAIDS DAGGERS COVER!    by Gerry Gertrudia & Esther Sanz THE MERMAIDS SAI COVER!  by Gerry Gertrudia & Esther Sanz THE MERMAIDS SWIMMING COVER!  by Javier Sanchez & NurmalizaTHE MERMAIDS JHANA AND EDRIS COVER!   by Javier Sanchez & Nurmaliza​  THE MAKING OF THE MERMAIDS BOOK: (100 PAGES) 100 page black and white book featuring the full script, all pencil layouts and more than 20 full page designs by The Mermaids cover artists and key designer Gerry Gertrudia!   Full script and layouts for entire graphic novel!Over 20 full page designs by The Mermaids cover artist and key designer Gerry Gertrudia!  THE MAKING OF THE MERMAIDS also features exclusive, detailed character backgrounds and information on 30+ characters! Jhana: A gifted teacher, Jhana spent her early life in the service of the young. When she finally indulges her own passions, they nearly destroy her. While tutoring the childlike Princess Melina, Jhana falls hopelessly in love with the dark, visiting princess Edris. Their torrid affair ends with the announcement of a political engagement between Edris and Melina, leaving Jhana devastated and suicidal. Though planning to end her misery on their wedding day, a visit with her benefactor Vana opens her eyes to the devastation caused by Queen Leith. Rather than end her life, she devotes it to overthrowing the Queen and the house of her former lover.Kendan: One of Jhana’s pupils, Kendan is good-hearted merchild with an extreme lack of focus, often seemingly unaware of what’s right in front of her. Rather than pay attention in class, she is forever running off to watch the scintillating colors of the rainbow fish. Is she a hopeless dreamer, addicted to shiny surfaces, ADD or all three? In any case, she’s present enough to remind her teacher to bid farewell to a benefactor, shaking Jhana from her own malaise.Gidri: Divine herald of Kalise, Gidri is tasked with rousing the creatures of the sea. The sadness of knowing all living things must die keeps her from accomplishing her goal. Enraged, Kalise gives her gills and fins, and casts her from his presence. Though her task is finally completed, she remains removed from her divine source. To the mermaids, she is a goddess in her own right, and an example to live by. Through worship they honor her love and sacrifice.Melina: Naïve, childlike daughter of Queen Leith, ruler of Loria, Melina loves both Jhana and Edris with an open heart. Unaware of their affair, her engagement to Edris delights her. Unaware of politics, her kidnapping by the rebels only confuses her.Edris: Impulsive daughter of Sandra’s Queen Vanthi, blackfish of the family, Edris loves the tutor Jhana with a passion. At the same time, she’s tired of living in the long shadow cast by her more noble sister, Elexa. When her mother betroths her to the naïve young Melina for political reasons, she turns her back on Jhana and obeys, only to find herself in a battle for the realm, on the opposite side of her former.Vava: A kindly older mermaid who took Jhana in when her affair with Edris ended and she was forced to leave the palace. It’s only when the compassionate Vava and her family are forced to leave Loria that Jhana sees firsthand the cruelty of Leith’s armies.Leith the Shark Queen: Everyone has heard the rumor that Loria’s ambitious ruler Leith killed her own mother to speed her ascension to the throne. Far fewer know that Loria is also a changeling, able to transform a deadly killer. As new leader, the Shark Queen’s cruelty begat rebellion, her harsh military response has destroyed the realm’s resources and forced the starving to flee in droves. Marrying her daughter Melina to Edris of Palagia, ties her family to the ocean’s most powerful army, leaving the other realms wondering who she’ll seek to conquer next.Thessa: Queen of Rhanur, the compassionate Thessa risks attack when she opens her borders to Loria’s starving fugitives. If Queen Leith believes her in league with the rebels, Rhanur may be her next target. Though supporting the rebel cause, Thessa not only has a far weaker military, she and her wife Ydim have a child on the way.Ydim:  Wife of Thessa, Queen of Rhanur, Ydim is pregnant with their first child, who will be heir to the throne – if the realm survives. Though she loves and respects her queen, the more pragmatic Ydim fears her too-kind wife will bring the Shark-queen’s wrath down on their smaller realm when she opens their borders to Loria’s starving fugitives.Loria: The undersea realm of Loria is second only to Palagia in size and strength. Once the gem of the seas, the cruel reign of Leith, the Shark Queen led to rebellion. The harsh military response collapsed the civil order, devastated their resources and led to a massive exodus of starving refugees. Rather than help her people, Leith is more interested in joining her family to Palagia by marriage. When she succeeds, neutralizing her biggest threat, it seems only a matter of time before the army shifts from crushing rebels to conquering new territory.Pelagia: With the most powerful military under the waves, whither Pelagia turns, so goes the undersea world. Only Loria’s army, if it joined with just one other realm, might challenge her. Some believe Loria’s recent aggressions led Pelagia’s Queen to agree to joining the ruling families through the marriage of her daughter Edris to Loria’s Princess Melina.Gordova: Gordova, capital of Loria, holds the grand palace of the vicious Queen Leith, where she lives with her conniving concubine, the Lady Vita, and her naïve, child-like daughter Melina. Once-glorious, thanks to Leith’s harsh treatment of the rebels, the city is now by plagued by famine and a decaying social order. The citizens live in fear, the starving flee in droves.Rhanur: A vulnerable neighbor to the newly militant Loria, the peaceful Rhanur has opened its borders to the starving refugees. Its own resources strained, should it prove to harbor the rebels Loria wants to destroy, it may swiftly become Queen Leith’s next target. When princess Melina is kidnapped and Loria’s armies on the move, the time has come for Rhanur to act.Vanthi: Queen of Sandar, the most powerful undersea realm, Vanthi is also mother to Edris, the family’s impulsive blackfish, and the noble Elexa, hero to the people. When Elexa returns from a quest suffering a strange madness, a cloud hands over the realm. With the powerful Loria stretching its muscles, Vanthi arranges a marriage between Edris and Loria’s Princess Melina, perhaps hoping to stave off an attack from her only military rival.Elexa: Daughter to Vanthi, princess of Pelagia, the epic feats of the brave, noble Elexa have set an example throughout the seas. When she returns from a dangerous quest suffering a strange madness, it makes the realm seem weaker. Family blackfish Edris becomes the only viable heir, and a pawn in a complex political game.Gimaine: Jester and gadfly to more than one queen, Gimaine’s brash, scathing tongue has nearly been cut out by irate royalty on many occasions. At the same time, had the old Queen of Loria heeded her warnings, she might still be alive, and her ambitious daughter not dragging the whole of the watery world into war. Much as Gimaine prefers to stand outside the ocean’s madness and observe with clever quips, Leith’s cruelty leads even the fool to take a stand – with the rebels.Madja:  Queen of Denor, while recognizing the danger of Leith’s aggression, Madja clings to what she knows best, a diplomatic solution. War is to be avoided at all costs, not only because of the loss of life, but because Denor’s army is hardly huge. Her concern rises when Edris and Melina are married, moreso when rebels kidnap Loria’s princess. It’s only when she’s goaded by Rhaur’s Queen Thessa that she feels her options have run out, and she must risk her people to take a stand against the Shark Queen.Grumia: Although one of the smaller realms, wealthy Grumia is known as the cultural center of the seas. What it lacks in numbers it makes up for in expertise, luxury and advanced weaponry. When Queen Barra invites the newlywed Edris and Melina to enjoy their honeymoon in Grumia’s lush environs, it’s taken as a signal of her decision to support the Shark Queen.Barra: The calculating Queen of Grumia, cultural center of the seas, Barra carefully tracks the shifting military powers. When Loria is joined to the powerful Pelagia in marriage, Barra chooses to ally with the cruel Queen Leith rather than face her wrath. Her decision, subtly announced at the wedding, rattles the other realms, forcing them to choose sides, or fall like dominoes.Sandar: Largest and most powerful of the undersea realms, Sandar’s standing army could easily squash any of the other realms. Only the newly aggressive Loria might prove a challenge – but when the two houses are joined by marriage, what could possibly stand in their way?Shere: Hopelessly cheery even in these dark times, Shere continues to run one of the few remaining inns on the outskirts of Loria. Though it doubles as a rebel base, despite the danger, the idealist rebel still adheres to the old rules of hospitality. Otherwise, she figures, they’re just as bad as Leith. Her kindness pays off when she allows Jhana inside, unwittingly giving the rebellion their newest, and perhaps most key, member.Rinko:  Curt, steely Rinko is a veteran, jaded by war and the loss of her comrades. Though lending her blade to the rebels, strategy makes her impatient, and she bristles at any command. Will her hot temper help or destroy their chances at success?Anaya: Terribly strong, and unwaveringly loyal to the rebel cause, Anaya is a rare changeling, able to puff her body up like a blowfish with terrifying results. Using her powerful arms to draw foes into her body and incapacitate them, she can likely defeat any single enemy.Abyssinia: Her body multi-colored and translucent, her mind opaque even to those who know her best, Abyssinia is a stranger in a strange land. Though she sides with the rebels, her motives remain as cryptic as her origins and her odd way of talking that makes her seem an alien species.Itsar: Leader of a ragtag rebel team, Itsar is a born strategist. Now, dogged on all sides by Leith’s soldiers, the clever mind that never failed her now struggles just to keep them alive. In a final, desperate effort to turn the tide, Istar decides on a desperate gambit – the kidnapping of princess Melina. The effort is a success, but now the whole of the Queen’s armies have one goal; finding and destroying them. If she makes it to neighboring Rhanur with her prize, it means the beginning of a war. If not, death.Vita: Concubine to Queen Leith, the Lady Vita’s own aspirations are kept in check by the fear of her lover. Eagerly taking the throne whenever the queen is away, she revels in the power, only to meekly surrendering it whenever her sadistic paramour returns.General Sot: Leader of Leith’s ruthless armies, once honored as a great military mind, General Sot now lives on a razor’s edge. Should she ever fail the queen, regardless of her stature or her experience, her life would be forfeit.Denor: Though one of the smaller realms, Denor has survived and thrived thanks to the clever diplomatic machinations of its calculating Queen, Madja. But in war, one cannot be a friend to all, and whose side they take, for good or ill, will likely decide Denor’s survival.The Three: Capable of rare magic, the Mer-crones known as The Three act as a means of instant communication. Through them, voice and image instantly travels the leagues, allowing the rich and the royal to speak with one another as if they were next to each other.Chaka the Joker:  One of four gods whose boredom creates the world, the jovial Chaka embodies the primal force of earth. His joyful mirth makes manifest all mountains, plains and canyons. With Raden, he brings lava, with Kalise, the swamps, with Aitor fertile soil.Raden the Furious:  One of four gods whose boredom creates the world, the explosive Raden embodies the primal force of fire. His rage brings flame, volcano and lightning into being. With Chaka, he brings lava, with Kalise, steam, with Aitor, hurricanes.Kalise the Wailer: One of four gods whose boredom creates the world, the emotional Kalise is the embodiment of the primal force of water. His tears bring the seas, lakes and rivers. With Chaka he brings the swamps, with Raden, steam, with Aitor, the rain.Aitor the Dreamer: One of four gods whose boredom creates the world, the ephemeral Aitor embodies the primal force of air. Through him come the wind, breath and ether. With Chaka, he brings fertile soil, with Raden, he brings hurricanes, with Aitor, the rain.Tendri: Divine herald of Chaka, Tendri is tasked with rousing the trees, seaweed and other plant life that blanket the earth and seas. She performs her duties with swift joy.Ladri: Divine herald of Aitor, Ladri is tasked with rousing the birds and flying fish that dance in his skies. She performs her duties with dancing abandon.Rugri: Divine herald of Raden, Rugri is tasked with rousing the warm spark of life that permeates all living things. She performs her tasks with a fiery intensity. THE MERMAIDS is RATED "T" – TEEN – Appropriate for readers age 12 and older. May contain mild violence, language and/or suggestive themes.  and don't miss my other series...COLLEGE OF THE DEAD GRADUATION DAY" "Where College Costs You An Arm And A Leg!" The script, pencils, inks, colors, letters and covers are all 100% done!  Book One is 140 pages in black and white, Book Two is 48 pages and full color.  Both are in print and can ship with your copies of THE MERMAIDS for no additional shipping if you purchase them in APRIL 2021!   

 
  Please support this campaign, and let others know!  Spread the word and share the link!www.epicmermaids.com

story:
The Story

In 1967, Scott Anders rocketed into space on a secret, CIA-sponsored mission referred to as the Kayless Project... to investigate an astronomical anomaly known only in the darkest corridors of the U.S. Government. Three days later all communication ceased. The project, seen  as an embarrassing and costly failure, was erased from history and forgotten.

Until today, when Scott mysteriously plummets to earth and emerges, unscathed, and hellbent on one purpose… to return to the anomaly in space. Why does he want to go back? How did he gain his new invulnerability? And what is the mysterious organization that stands in his way, determined to protect the secret of Kayless at all costs?

What We Need & What You Get

We're campaigning to get the funds to print and ship the KAYLESS Graphic Novel, 88 pages of story and art that collects Kayless issues #1-#4. You can choose to get the Graphic Novel collection...

...the individual issues, or both.

Who's Running This?

Silverline is run by Roland Mann (the owner of this account). A veteran of the comic industry, Roland got his start in comics in the late 80s during the black and white boom. He became an editor for Malibu (where he gave artist Mike S. Miller some of his first work), Ultraverse (where he was editor of SLUDGE, done by superstar artist Aaron Lopresti), and ultimately Marvel Comics. He was...downsized in the late 90s when Marvel declared bankruptcy. He's mostly been teaching college since then. Silverline has it's roots in the late 80s when Roland partnered with his friend, roommate, and artist Steven Butler to start Silverline.

Dual Campaign

The first two issues were funded on Kickstarter. We are running a similar campaign there with the same basic product. So while we'd love to see dual pledges, we want to be fully transparent that if you're just trying to support us (we THANK YOU!), you don't really need to back on both places.

Risks & Challenges

Silverline has run and fulfilled 12 campaigns on kickstarter. We know how to make and ship comics. Our biggest risk is coming to IGG and totally flopping, because our biggest challenge will be getting the word out that we're here.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share the heck out of this. This is Silverline's first venture onto IGG and we really believe the COMIC FANS AND READERS will enjoy our comics.

story:
STORY-

The Super Dragonfly Sentinels are an organized group recruited by Beltox Van Velspot, also known as "The Curator". Beltox is The lead Scientist in DNA Modification, and an expert in dragonfly DNA. His collection of different species from different planets led people to nickname him The Curator. They reside on the planet Selusha, a murky,  red planet that looks like a hybrid of Earth and Mars. Their job is to protect Selusha and its Neighboring Planets from the hands of the Alnoe; a lizard-like race who is searching for planets to repopulate to as their home planet is dying. They want to wipe out all races other than themselves from the universe. The Sentinels must stop them or else the Planet Selusha will face extinction.

 

 

The Super Dragonfly Sentinels #1 is a 36 page fully colored comic

MEET THE HEROES: 

 

THE SHADOW OCEAN DRAGONFLY SENTINEL

 

MICHIGAN RAMIREZ-

She is the leader of the team. A former space cop who lost her partner Cole in a car explosion. She then is recruited by Beltox. Even though she is traumatized by his death, she fights on and finds a new purpose and motivation.

 

 

 

THE AMBER TEMPEST DRAGONFLY SENTINEL

MATTHEW SEL BASMA- 

Matthew, or Matt for short, is an expert sorcerer in the arts of "Juzu" ; Planetary Magic. He uses spells to conjure elements and many different exotic spells for different situations. His spells become more powerful when he "Modifies" and becomes The Amber Tempest Dragonfly Sentinel. Matt gets recruited by Beltox, while studying at Acadamy of the Selucian Arts, a school of Juzu magic users.

 

 

 

THE SCARLET ROSE DRAGONFLY SENTINEL

GRAYSON LORE-

Grayson battles to obtain his parent's love and approval, as he tries to do what he loves which is to dance and make people laugh. Unfortunately, his parents dislike his career choices. Grayson runs away from his problems and is in the process of drinking his life away when Beltox recruits him with the promise of a way to make his parents appreciate him. He tells him that by becoming a Sentinel he will help open his parent's eyes

 

 

CREATIVE TEAM:

 

Writer/President of Crystal Break Studios:  Edwin Burgos, the creative mind of The Super Dragonfly Sentinels. 

 

 

Illustrator/Colorist: Marcelo Costa always wanted to be an artist and work on comics. His goal is to get better every day and to keep up with deadlines. 

 

 

 

Letterer: Reed Hinckley-Barnes, has a natural talent in his craft. The way he puts the letters onto the page with such passion is amazing. My Team is hardworking and fierce and we love challenges.

 

 

 

What's in it for you? 

An amazing-looking professional, Tokusatsu-style Comicbook issue. with your choice of standard or variant cover drawn by the amazing Jack Comic Art. The Standard Book is $10.00 USD and the variant is $15.00 USD, while the PDF digital copy will be $ 5.00 USD.

We are asking for $1500, to cover printing and shipping costs and materials. the book itself is already done, so fulfillment is a guarantee. 

 

Risks & Challenges:

With COVID-19 being the threat that it has been, there could be delays in shipping. However, I'll keep all of you posted as the time draws closer to ship. Regardless of whether or not I reach my goal I will still print and send your books.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word and share my Page with your friends, comic book enthusiasts, or people who love Tokusatsu in general.

Remember, IndieGoGo has a sharing tool just for that.

Please share anywhere and everywhere you can. Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any place else you can think of.

Every little bit goes a long way! Thank you for your support.

story:
PLEASE NOTE:  We will be fulfilling the rewards from Europe, the USA, and Australia in order to lower shipping costs for the backers. The pledges are in Australian dollars and will be converted to your local currency.

Ahmose: Book I is an all-new 80-page graphic novel, the first in a two-volume series created and written by Ben Slabak. It is set in ancient Egypt and is inspired by real individuals and events.

It is an oversized graphic novel (21.4cm x 29.6cm or 8.4 x 11.6 inches) that is beautifully illustrated and masterfully coloured, available in a standard softcover and a premium hardcover edition. 

 

Ahmose: Book I takes place in the 16th century B.C. during the transition from what is referred to as the Second Intermediate Period to the New Kingdom. It is presented from the point of view of the Theban Dynasty and their struggle with the people known as the Hyksos who originated in the Levantine region and who eventually came to rule much of Egypt.

The story follows Ahmose, the son of King Seqenenre Tao II, and Ahmose, son of Ibana (whose tomb inscriptions are one of the very few written records we have of the conflict with the Hyksos). 

As Ahmose Ibana grows into a battle-hardened warrior, and prince Ahmose into a God-King, together they will re-forge the Egyptian kingdom.

 

LIMITED EDITION ADD-ONS THAT MAKE FANTASTIC GIFTS!

A finely carved steatite scarab fired with blue glaze, commissioned from an art gallery in  Luxor, Egypt. Limited to just 30 units, it features an inscription on the bottom that reads 'Ahmose, Son of Ra', and comes pierced and ready to wear. Should you prefer to display it, a 3D floating display case is included. This is not a cheap scarab that you can pick up at any souq in Egypt, it is a beautiful, finely crafted work of art that is extremely rare!

 

A custom bookmark with your or your loved one's name in Egyptian hieroglyphs is available in unlimited quantities and makes a great gift! And even better if it comes with an extra copy of the book :)! If you have any family members or friends who have an interest in ancient history, this book, along with the custom bookmark, makes a fantastic gift!

For those who enjoy jigsaw puzzles, we've produced a limited number of 500-piece and 1000-piece puzzles featuring the fantastic artwork from the covers of the softcover and the hardcover edition of AHMOSE: BOOK I. These puzzles are crowdfunding exclusives and will not be made available outside crowdfunding campaigns.

 

 

And last, but most definitely not the least, is arguably the most special add-on of this campaign. 

 

 

Hi! I'm Ben Slabak, the writer and creator of Ahmose. I am very excited to be bringing you this epic tale from Egypt's rich history.

Some of my earliest memories include an absolute fascination with ancient Egypt, and from a very early age, I devoured anything and everything on the subject.

 

When an opportunity presented itself to study Egyptology at a university, I jumped at the chance, and eventually completed a Masters of Arts in Egyptology, which included taking part in fieldwork in Luxor, Egypt.

This project has been a labour of love for the past 18 months, with the entire team putting in an extraordinary amount of effort with fabulous attention to detail. I do hope you consider backing it and/or sharing the campaign with your family and friends.

The connecting covers of Ahmose Book I and Book II

 

The production of Book I is in the final stages and will be going to print shortly, meaning we will be fulfilling it very soon!

Should you prefer to display it, a 3D floating display case is included. This is not a cheap scarab that you can pick up at any souq in Egypt, it is a beautiful, finely crafted work of art that is extremely rare! A custom bookmark with your or your loved one's name in Egyptian hieroglyphs is available in unlimited quantities and makes a great gift! And even better if it comes with an extra copy of the book :)! If you have any family members or friends who have an interest in ancient history, this book, along with the custom bookmark, makes a fantastic gift!For those who enjoy jigsaw puzzles, we've produced a limited number of 500-piece and 1000-piece puzzles featuring the fantastic artwork from the covers of the softcover and the hardcover edition of AHMOSE: BOOK I. These puzzles are crowdfunding exclusives and will not be made available outside crowdfunding campaigns.  And last, but most definitely not the least, is arguably the most special add-on of this campaign.   Hi! I'm Ben Slabak, the writer and creator of Ahmose. I am very excited to be bringing you this epic tale from Egypt's rich history.Some of my earliest memories include an absolute fascination with ancient Egypt, and from a very early age, I devoured anything and everything on the subject. When an opportunity presented itself to study Egyptology at a university, I jumped at the chance, and eventually completed a Masters of Arts in Egyptology, which included taking part in fieldwork in Luxor, Egypt.This project has been a labour of love for the past 18 months, with the entire team putting in an extraordinary amount of effort with fabulous attention to detail. I do hope you consider backing it and/or sharing the campaign with your family and friends.The connecting covers of Ahmose Book I and Book II The production of Book I is in the final stages and will be going to print shortly, meaning we will be fulfilling it very soon!

story:
Some secrets are better off undisturbed.

Debts are always paid.

Yet not always the way we expect.

Fortune isn't fair.

Death often is. 

HAVOC is a modern day noir thriller following the story of Interpol Agent Kathren Sanis as she surveils a covert organization converging in New York for sinister reasons. The cabal's goal is to obtain the key to effectively controlling the criminal underworld and by extension, the world. Only a meddling agent and a seemingly bumbling bystander stand in their way.

Tension builds and action shifts in a 48-page full color graphic novel with heavy thriller undertones hearkening back to classic 90's action movies.

Story by Vault Kobold

Art by Archsider

Edits by Steve Dye

Letters by Jaymes Reed

Production of the book is already complete. Hard copy proofs have been ordered, received, reviewed and approved. The book will go to print immediately after the initial campaign concludes. And then it's on to your door.

 

But that's not all.

Also available is the 40-page illustrated long-form novella TRIALS & TRIUMPH. 

A story of a man that is more then he seems but less then what he was.

Searching for a way back while moving forward.

He must gamble with fate for a chance to live again. Every step, questioning the risk for the reward. Find out in TRIALS & TRIUMPH.

Again, both books are complete and ready for print. As a first time creator and someone that wants to ensure a quality product as well as professional delivery. I've sought to make the process as smooth as possible for backers and to have these precious packages delivered as soon and as safely as possible to your door.

 Books and accompanying items will be sent out in secure Gemini Mailers. Tracking numbers will be provided to keep backers updated on the status of their delivery and assist us in providing any support if needed.

Thanks for your consideration of Havoc. 

Stretch Goals:

story:
AMAZINGIZE #1

4 NEW FANTASY UNIVERSES FOR YOU!

UPDATE: 12 PAGES OF STORY ADDED!!! 28 TOTAL PAGES OF STORYTELLING IN AMAZINGIZE #1

Debut of: JOAN OF ARC vs THE UNDEAD, KNIGHTCRY, VOID REAPER & WINE!

Hi! This is Eric VT! You might know me from VT Comics Live - where me & my POPS sling hordes of comics to you awesome fans! Now though... the time has finally come! We unleash 4 brand new universes for your ultimate enjoyment! Dare to be AMAZINGIZED!

AMAZINGIZE #1 Cover Art by Victor Capola

THE AMAZINGIZE UNIVERSES:

KNIGHTCRY Variant Cover by Dave Farrar of Geek Fine Art

AMAZINGIZERS - WE NEED YOU!

The purpose of this Indiegogo crowdfund campaign? To put these universes into YOUR hands! Your contribution helps with artwork, production, printing, fulfillment & more. In exchange, you'll experience the ORIGINS of AMAZINGIZE Universes & score a ton of awesome stuff! Our goal is to make the very best product for you - so you crave and need MORE AMAZINGIZING!

 

AMAZINGIZE #1 has something for everyone! YOU'LL LOVE it if you like: Star Wars Star Trek, Walking Dead, D&D, Game of Thrones, Lord of the Rings, Historical Fiction, What If? scenarios, Dark Crystal, NeverEnding Story, Sopranos, Peaky Blinders, The Godfather, Batman, Moon Knight and Superheroes! We wanted to include various genres in this book!

 

Remember, the better we do - the better product we can deliver to you! Trust me, I can't wait to share the visions, artwork and perks lined up for YOU! So wait no longer, AMAZINGIZER!

LET'S GET MORE AMAZINGIZED!

AMAZINGIZE #1 is currently a 16 page, black & white comic book - consisting of four 4 page stories. Our intention is to make it TWICE THE SIZE - 32 pages! I also want to blast you with a FULL ARRAY OF COLORS! My hope is to bring you the FINEST QUALITY PRODUCT & have your investment in AMAZINGIZE, pay off beyond your hopes & dreams! So...

 

LET'S ADD PAGES! The TRUE AMAZINGIZER PACK allows YOU to choose a story to be expanded by 4 pages! YOU GET DRAWN INTO THOSE PAGES TOO!!! Each story has been written to be expanded upon and will only get better. Artists are ready to go! If we get all 4 stories expanded through these perks - we reach 32 PAGES OF STORY! GET IN THE BOOK!!!

LET'S ADD COLOR! First 4 Stretch Perk Goals will allow COLOR to be added! Once reaching the initial goal, every $500 after that will get one of our 4 stories COLORED! Reaching $3200 gets AMAZINGIZE #1 in FULL COLOR! We need YOU to make it 32 FULL COLOR PAGES! $3500 will get every backer a bookmark completely conceptualized by the man himself: POPS VT!

ADD ONS AVAILABLE:

Pops VT/Grove Poem Sketch Cover - Only 40 available and each with a unique poem written by published poet & former Rolling Stone magazine writer: Gary Von Tersch

Add on AMAZINGIZE #1 Blank Variant with a pen and ink sketch cover by KNIGHTCRY Variant cover artist: DAVE FARRAR of GEEK FINE ART! This is a price point you won't ever find again!

SHIPPING: At AMAZINGIZE COMICS, we know your transport to our universes starts with a nice, clean package delivered to you. We take great care of your comics and treat them like our own! With over 5 years experience shipping comic books - you are good to go!

AMAZINGIZE CREATIVE TEAM:

AMAZINGIZE TIMELINE:

AMAZINGIZE CHARACTER BIOS:

JOAN OF ARC: The Maid of Orleans' true life story is amazing! Now it's AMAZINGIZED! She joins true historical characters, including her executioner to fend off the Black ZOMBIE Plague! She will also face un-undead enemies - including the King of France - who she put on the throne!

THE UNDEAD: The Black Plague has mutated about 75 years after it's actual European outbreak. How this happens is unknown but will eventually be revealed. The Black Death now (literally) walks the Earth... PRAY!

KNIGHTCRY: KNIGHTCRY isn't the world's greatest detective - he is the world's most renowned psychologist. He's not a loner - he is a family man. He has no utility belt - he has a highly advanced cape, where every strip holds a different tech ability! The AMAZINGVERSE ignited!

VOID REAPER: The REAPER is Kreed and Irenn's ship. What happens to turn it into the VOID REAPER and the universe's last hope?!? KREED and IRENN grew up together and have become one of the greatest smuggling teams around. Their relationship has already changed the galaxy and their destiny goes far beyond the known universe!

WINE CHARACTERS

GROVE: The owner and vintner of Ye Olde WINE Port - the most popular destination in the known universe! Grove is an ancient sorcerer whose special vintages of wine, often contain aspects of potions. Some potions make the wine taste better, some make the wine ferment faster, some make the wine last longer but most importantly, some give special effects to the drinker of the wine. These are generally very expensive and reserved for the most elite of customers. But not all visitors to Ye Olde Wine Port have the best intentions...

“Greetings! Welcome to Ye Olde Wine Port! This is my humble establishment! Now, I must insist you ask your palette to name a taste you never even dreamed of before. Take your time and think of starflowers… or lavaginger… or even the spice rings of Saturn 11! Whatever your desire, it will be my absolute honor to quench it with a sampling from my vast and timeless collection of wines! Smile! You are my celebrated guests! I raise my glass to you all!” – GROVE

CYRA QUOTE: Ye Olde Wine Port’s Technology and Security Expert. Cyra is of an unknown alien species and was found badly wounded in an ancient space vessel. Grove rescued her and while recovering, she memorized all of Ye Olde Wine Port’s technical data within days! But what happens when a mysterious, transporting trickster hints he's from Cyra’s lost past?

“Ye Olde Wine Port? Who talks like that anymore? I swear! Now, if I had my way we would call this thing The Specialized Brobdingnagian Mechanization of Wine’s Alpha and Omega Circumnavigation Sanctuary Rendezvous Resort… AND TASTINGS TOO!” – CYRA

SPRING QUOTE: Viticulturist and Ye Olde Wine Port’s defensive systems specialist. Spring can control the shield amount percentages and where they are allocated to a great degree. With Grove’s help, she has also created defensive measures like cloaked invasion drones. Although, connected to nature - is she the reason for an entire planet's environmental collapse? And what powerful being blames her for it?

“Oh… what I would give for a real sun.” – SPRING

JANN VANN SPIKE: Ye Olde Wine Port’s Sommelier (Captain and resident Wine Expert) because of her flight commanding skills and unrivaled palate. Grove developed a magical tastevin that can recreate the elements in the space surrounding his ship and quickly put them into a safe liquid form. Jann can taste the vastness of space from the enchanted tastevin she wears around her neck and determine things like: how many ships have been nearby recently, what type of world they originated from and have been to recently, if a battle has taken place nearby and the types of weapons used, the best and most aromatic flavors from a nearby world, and more! She can even taste the weak spots in an enemy ship’s hull.

“I taste… LASER FIRE!” – JANN VANN SPIKE

MUSASHI: Grove’s Master Chef. He 's also a master warrior - using the two sword kenjutsu technique! His kitchens and dojos are his temples. What happens when Musashi's sworn arch enemy and greatest culinary enemy team up together? Can even the legendary Musashi survive?

“You may choose your place of defeat. The fields or the kitchen? It matters not to me. I am Musashi. I've never lost a battle upon either ground.” – MUSASHI

The Impact

We're bringing 4 new universes into the comic book medium! These are stories that each have a distinct future but it all starts here! Who knows what could happen with any of these 4 stories!

  • Value: You get a comic book that's meant to be held in your hands, read and enjoyed!
  • Value: You get in on the ground floor and speculation is at an all time high!
  • Value: This is my dream! I want you to be part of it! That being said - I will only do the very best job for not only my dream - but for YOU!

Risks & Challenges

Over 50% of the production has been completed. I've been selling comics online for over 5 years and have a track record of near perfection! I ship great and am a very trusted seller! YOU WILL GET WHAT YOU COMMIT TO! I'm hoping you LOVE IT too!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share! Tell your friends and family! Let's get the world AMAZINGIZED! THANK YOU!!!

story:
Thanks for your time and consideration. 
FREE PREVIEW of THE TOMMY GUN DOLLS VOL. 1 
Click to download 40 page PDF!

 

Color sample by Lisa D. Gonzales, who will be the colorist for the 16-page prequel comic.

 

Interior art from Vol. 1 The Big Knockover

Sample head sketch inside the book on the end papers, signed.

 

THE TOMMY GUN DOLLS VOL. 2

Frankie, the grifter is back along with those bawdy burlesque girls--Poppy, Mai and Rose as they'll discover what friendship and trust really means to one another. The stakes get higher as they close in on finding Rouletta's murderer while in the midst of an all out turf war between the crime syndicates in San Francisco’s seedy underworld backstreets during the Prohibition Era.

Inspired by a true story of San Francisco’s dark underworld, a group of Prohibition Era burlesque dancers pursue their friend’s murder by posing as masked bandits and knocking over the Mob’s speakeasies. The Tommy Gun Dolls is a sordid tale told in the classic Noir tradition, with roots in San Francisco’s historic Nob Hill Mansions of society’s elite class down to the seedy gang-filled streets of Chinatown, through the Tenderloin and neighboring North Beach. 

$9,500 VOL. 2 FUNDING GOAL ACHIEVED!
$10,000 Stretch Goal: Signed and Numbered Bookplate *UNLOCKED*
$11,000 Stretch Goal: TGD LOGO DIE CUT VINYL STICKER *UNLOCKED*
$12,000 Stretch Goal: 16-Page Frankie Origin Comic *UNLOCKED*
$13,000 Stretch Goal: Original Art Giveaway *UNLOCKED*
$14,000 Stretch Goal: Original Art Giveaway II *UNLOCKED*
$15,000 Stretch Goal: 32-Page Full-Color Sketchbook PDF Copy to all backers, SIGNED Color 8x10 Print *UNLOCKED*
$18,000 Stretch Goal: 16-Page Frankie Origin Comic in FULL COLOR by Lisa D. Gonzales! (Chew! Buffy the Vampire Slayer) *UNLOCKED*
$20,000 Stretch Goal: Original Art Giveaway III • Pen & Ink 11 x 17 Signed. *UNLOCKED*


$22,000 Stretch Goal: Original Art Giveaway IIII • 11x17 Pen & Ink Original Art/Signed. *UNLOCKED*


$25,000 Stretch Goal: All Print Backers Receive an Enamel Pin!

$30,000 Stretch Goal: Unlock this goal to find out!

Barbara Stanwyck/Fred MacMurrary--Double Indemnity
Mixed Media on toned paper 11x14

Every backer will receive a die cut vinyl sticker for supporting THE TOMMY GUN DOLLS.

In 2017, The Tommy Gun Dolls graphic novel was the Grand Prize Recipient of Pulsar Entertainment's Comic Creator Contest

"Dolls is the only entrant that left me literally craving to read more. It is well-researched and smartly dialogued with almost no anachronisms to bounce me out of the story. The narrative is ambitious and mature. It feels like the work of a professional, experienced writer at the peak of his powers-- someone who is already established and has been around. It is totally pro work. The same thing goes for the artwork-- clear, solid expositional skills, sophisticated visual storytelling that's clever and effective without ever becoming smart-ass or obscure. The period work is nearly perfect-- very authentic and well-researched. Daniel Cooney is clearly a student of history and not afraid to use reference." 

- JON BOGDANOVE, Celebrity Judge

Taking visual inspiration from illustrators such as Russell Patterson, Ethel Hays and Faith Burrows, who popularized the look and lifestyle of the 1920s flapper, and the writings of F. Scott Fitzgerald and Dashiell Hammett, I've crafted a tale of mystery, suspense and burlesque in fog city.

The inspiration for the story's main character, Frankie Broadstreet, a grifter who rides a Penny Farthing bicycle and has a penchant for wearing men's clothes, stems from a fusion of two real life people: Jeanne/Jean Bonnet (1841-1876), a trans man who founded one of California’s strangest criminal gangs composed entirely of women during the gold rush era; and Louise Brooks, an American dancer and actress, best known for popularizing the bobbed haircut and starred in the German feature film, Pandora’s Box. 

Shipping Schedule

I expect to have your pledges shipped to you in the Fall of 2019. The designs of the book are completed, the sequential pages need to be finished, inked, lettered and edited prior to going to press. 

All books are shipped within the U.S.A. by USPS Mail and will include a tracking number emailed to you. Original art pages and commission rewards shipped in the U.S.A. will ship USPS First Class mail and include a tracking number to you as well.

The pledges shipped to our international friends can take up to 3 weeks for delivery and up to 6 weeks depending on the country you live in.

Take note, that customs may hold on to packages for a week or longer and incur additional charges that are the responsibility of the backer. I'm aware shipping overseas expensive and wish it wasn't the case! The time to process your pledge, pack it securely and ship it to you is covered by the shipping charge, I make no additional funds for the shipping charge to you.

Risks and challenges

I had a successful campaign a couple of years ago for Volume One of The Tommy Gun Dolls graphic novel. Aside from some health issues that slowed my progress considerably on the first book (see previous updates) I've been in great health since last fall and look forward to completing volume two and eager to share it with you.

$25,000 Stretch Goal: All Print Backers Receive an Enamel Pin!$30,000 Stretch Goal: Unlock this goal to find out!
Barbara Stanwyck/Fred MacMurrary--Double IndemnityMixed Media on toned paper 11x14

Every backer will receive a die cut vinyl sticker for supporting THE TOMMY GUN DOLLS.


In 2017, The Tommy Gun Dolls graphic novel was the Grand Prize Recipient of Pulsar Entertainment's Comic Creator Contest
"Dolls is the only entrant that left me literally craving to read more. It is well-researched and smartly dialogued with almost no anachronisms to bounce me out of the story. The narrative is ambitious and mature. It feels like the work of a professional, experienced writer at the peak of his powers-- someone who is already established and has been around. It is totally pro work. The same thing goes for the artwork-- clear, solid expositional skills, sophisticated visual storytelling that's clever and effective without ever becoming smart-ass or obscure. The period work is nearly perfect-- very authentic and well-researched. Daniel Cooney is clearly a student of history and not afraid to use reference." 
- JON BOGDANOVE, Celebrity Judge



Taking visual inspiration from illustrators such as Russell Patterson, Ethel Hays and Faith Burrows, who popularized the look and lifestyle of the 1920s flapper, and the writings of F. Scott Fitzgerald and Dashiell Hammett, I've crafted a tale of mystery, suspense and burlesque in fog city.

The inspiration for the story's main character, Frankie Broadstreet, a grifter who rides a Penny Farthing bicycle and has a penchant for wearing men's clothes, stems from a fusion of two real life people: Jeanne/Jean Bonnet (1841-1876), a trans man who founded one of California’s strangest criminal gangs composed entirely of women during the gold rush era; and Louise Brooks, an American dancer and actress, best known for popularizing the bobbed haircut and starred in the German feature film, Pandora’s Box. 
Shipping Schedule
I expect to have your pledges shipped to you in the Fall of 2019. The designs of the book are completed, the sequential pages need to be finished, inked, lettered and edited prior to going to press. 
All books are shipped within the U.S.A. by USPS Mail and will include a tracking number emailed to you. Original art pages and commission rewards shipped in the U.S.A. will ship USPS First Class mail and include a tracking number to you as well.
The pledges shipped to our international friends can take up to 3 weeks for delivery and up to 6 weeks depending on the country you live in.
Take note, that customs may hold on to packages for a week or longer and incur additional charges that are the responsibility of the backer. I'm aware shipping overseas expensive and wish it wasn't the case! The time to process your pledge, pack it securely and ship it to you is covered by the shipping charge, I make no additional funds for the shipping charge to you.
Risks and challenges
I had a successful campaign a couple of years ago for Volume One of The Tommy Gun Dolls graphic novel. Aside from some health issues that slowed my progress considerably on the first book (see previous updates) I've been in great health since last fall and look forward to completing volume two and eager to share it with you.

story:
Introducing CALICO.  

Sigma Comics introduces CALICO Vol. 1: PIN-UP GALLERY, an 8-part comic book series that will increase sales of dark-colored underwear everywhere. This campaign is for Issue #1.

Sigma Comics was formed to give a stronger voice to a group that cohabitates this planet with us, yet are routinely encroached upon, threatened, abused and killed. Animals don’t have superheroes. They have well-intending people who join charities and fight for just causes. But they can only engage in peaceful activities that count on perpetrators to change their behavior, whenever they're ready. CALICO represents a very different approach. Encounters with CALICO end the problem. Permanently.

Needless to say, this series will be made strictly for mature audiences. We expect our first issue to be available for purchase by Christmas 2020.  With your continued support, we can ensure the success of the entire 8-book series.

We need your support for two reasons.

1. So we can put out an awesome, high-quality comic book.
2. So we can expand the reach of exceptionally effective animal rights groups.

By backing this crowding-funding effort, you will receive:

- A SUPER INTENSE comic book with AWESOME art and CAPTIVATING writing!
- The knowledge that your money is going to a completely noble cause!
- The ability to pre-order Issue #1 and get it before everyone else!

Select Perks include: 
- Super-Cool Sigma Comics Apparel
- Cover Artist 11 x 17 Poster
- Sigma Comics Stickers

LET'S DO THIS!

We've been working very hard to make this project a reality and we need your help to put it past the goal line. We can do it together! Contribute by buying a perk or donating to this wonderful effort. Any amount is appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Please share this campaign on social media, feature it on your Website, publication or channel, or invite us to talk about it with your network/audience!

STRETCH GOALS!

$10,000 - ALL BACKERS GET THE 11 X 17 CALICO POSTER!!!
LET'S GET TO $10,000!!!

story:
SHORT SUMMARY:

THE PAGAN is the bad ass Puerto Rican Superhero you didn’t know you’ve been waiting for!

   The premiere, 28 page issue, of  THE PAGAN! This is issue dives into the paranoid world of Manuel “Manny” Pagan, THE DAMNED SHAMAN. To most the world around him, Manny, is a generally good guy. By day he works and lives above an orphanage. By night he parties like he might die tomorrow. Is he just paranoid or is someone truly after him? More importantly what is the "fix" he seems so desperate to obtain?

   A man framed for his daughter’s murder and estranged from everything he’s ever known. He must learn how to control his emotions... so he can BLLLLLAAAAST his enemies to shreds with them! 

 

THE STORY: (Some Spoilers)

   Trained by a secret society to use his powers of persuasion to control the masses and then exiled for refusal, Manny hunts for meaning and some semblance of peace and normality. Brokenhearted, soul tainted and framed for his daughter’s murder he finds safety living above an orphanage in a small community when his true powers emerge. Visions of his daughter haunt Manny while he hides from both public and secret societies. It is in this hidden hell, The Pagan is born...

 

REWARDS & TIERS:

All Physical Tiers get the Digital copy and Digital Preview Comic!

The Lunch Box is only available at the LUNCHBOX and SUPER FAN tiers.

The more backers, the more we will add to your purchase! So remember to SHARE!

 

REPRESENTATION:

"Growing up, comic books meant the world to me! They were my passion and my escape but I never found myself in the pages. When I started sharing my favorite stories and superheroes with my daughters it really hit me, I didn't have a Puerto Rican superhero or even an authentic Puerto Rican story to share with them...so I decided to share mine. The Pagan is a story of a displaced Taino without a tribe. This is ONE Puerto Rican story..." ~ David Pagan 

 

VARIANT COVER:

    We have a special variant cover from DC artist Yanick Paquette! We will reveal this cover very soon! Reserve you copy ASAP!

THE ART:

   Below are a few samples of the art work, we will be releasing the A Cover very soon, and the Variant Cover by Yanick Paquette! You may notice there is very little showing the "beast" seen in some of the art above... that is because there is a major plot point we are avoiding... we will add some other action scenes as we receive more artwork from GS20 Studio our production partner. 

 

LETTER FROM THE CREATOR:

    “From the bottom of my heart, thank you for sharing this with me. I’ve always loved comics as a kid so writing one has been a surreal experience. Still doesn’t feel real but it has been fun as F*_K. The writing process gave birth to an entire universe even we were surprised by so I hope you enjoy reading it as much as we enjoyed writing this bad boy!”       ~David Pagan

 

LOCATION:

This book is set in Orlando, Florida! Real people and real locations are used as inspiration for the artwork you see. Even the music used in our video is provided by Metane Phillips (AKA- METANE)! 

 

COSTS and STRETCH GOALS:

Our goal is to cover the cost of creating the book, the cover, the variant cover, and printing all the rewards. We also plan to add some bonus materials to your rewards if we can get past a few of our goals. This includes the $5,000 mark, $10,000, and $15,000. We understand that the costs may seem high compared to buying in a store, but you are not just buying the book... you're helping us create it!

 

SHIPPING:

We understand that when you pick a campaign to back you try to estimate every penny you spend. We are working with a TOP fulfillment printer to get you the BEST comics and merch. Shipping has increased over time and we have set out prices for shipping as low as we can without taking a loss or being unable to fulfill your order. These complications are also why we currently are not offering shipping to outside the United States. However, we have worked hard to make sure things are ready to ship as fast as possible. Once we receive funds we will begin shipping!

 

Risks & Challenges:

This book has had many challenges, including COVID19. But we have worked nonstop to try and bring this to you as soon as possible! It is David Pagan's first book and he intends a total of twelve. So one of our main challenges was making sure this first book was not only going to deliver the information you need for the following books, but that it would be a great story all by itself! We want readers to be able to read one issue and feel like they went for a ride!

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Please share this campaign with your social media, fiends, and family! There are not enough Puerto Rican characters in today's world! WTF Comics has many other projects and we take each one very seriously! Help this project be a success so we can continue to bring you all new characters, stories and creators! At WTF Comics one of our top priorities is to elevate talented creators that have never gotten the attention they deserve!

 

SOCIAL MEDIA:

  • Pagan Instagram
  • Pagan Facebook
  • Pagan Website
  • WTF Comics Instagram
  • WTF Comics Facebook
  • WTF Comics - Other Titles

story:
Marion Maxx makes its debut on INDIEGOGO! 

Marion Maxx is the continuing story originally from Blank and follows Dr. Kind and Marion as they escape from New Haven, trying to get away from the clutches of SynapCorp. Their success rides on getting one final experiment on SynapCorp's abandoned island lab where Dr. Kind used to work. But the corporation is on to his plans and will stop at nothing to stop them!

 

The Creative Team Written by Keith Carmona with Artwork by Andy Tiu.

Marion Maxx is a 14 page comic which continues the story arch started in "Blank" comic book set and is a fan inspired book. This is a "Mature Readers" book with blood, violence, and partial nudity. For those who want to see where "Blank" continues or for those who are new to the story who like dystopian storylines, this is your chance! 

 

MARION MAXX+BLANK+SPECIAL GOODIES!

With the success of Blank, we've made some special packs and goodies available for for the 1st time through this campaign.

Sticker:

These Blank stickers were first sold at conventions but are now being featured in the Maximum bundle.

T-Shirts:

Scattered Comics artist Noel Serrato ("Blinth", "SHADOW HUNTERS") shows off his talents in this pin-up version of Marion. Originally, featured at conventions, this t-shirt can be your through this campaign. Black shirt silk screened with White Ink. (Available in all sizes.) **Note: Shirts shipped separately from comic books.

 

From co-owner of Scattered Comics, Jason Dube ("SHADOW HUNTERS" series), offers up this original featuring Dr. Kind. This is the first time this shirt has been available. Black shirt silk screened with White Ink. (Available in all sizes.) **Note: Shirts shipped separately from comic books.

BUNDLES!!!

Whether you're new to the story or anxious to continue, there's a bundle for you!

 

 

The Goal:

 

The goal with this campaign is to provide you with fun and entertaining high quality comics. We need enough for the printing, distribution, and fees to bring these comic books to life and in your hands. I be packing and shipping the comic books with Gemini Comic Flash Mailers. (The chosen way to get comic books safely to you.)

Risks & Challenges

The comic books pretty much all done, we just need to get it to the printers and ship it to you. 

Help Us Spread the Word Please!

 

We would appreciate any help you can provide by Sharing this page to your friends and family by just hitting the Indiegogo share buttons at the top!

Thank you for taking the time to look things over!

Keith Carmona

Follow me on my YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdg0UfH1zuXLmUiKK00JGBw

story:
NEON WASTELAND #2 

44 pages of animated cyberpunk action!!!

PRODUCT DEMO

STORY

Neon Wasteland is Mad Max meets the Matrix with over-the-top, anime inspired action sequences and a psychedelic color palette that's so bright you can taste it.   

Neon Wasteland tells a story that crosses between two realities.  The first is a simulated digital reality set in a retro future 1988.  The second is wasteland Earth in the year 2088.  

In 1988,  RIN, a geisha bot forced to relive her own death endlessly, finds an unlikely companion in the Accelerator, a skull faced pizza delivery boy who drives a nuclear powered stainless steel sports car. If the two can learn to work together, they just might escape their digital prison and cross over into the real world.  

In 2088, Rabbit, Brandy and their family of wasteland misfits known as the Gutter Punks prepare for Death Race '88.  When a group of undead mutant soldiers invade their village, the Gutter Punks must team up with arch rivals the Pixel Kids or die at the hands of the radioactive mutant horde.  

Which reality is the true reality?  Things are not always what they seem.  The deeper the story goes, the more each world begins to blend, not only with each other but with our own. 

PREVIEW

 Neon Wasteland #1 Demo

Check out the below videos to see the previous issue & app in action.

 
 

TRY IT OUT NOW

Download the free Neon Wasteland AR app from the App or Play store and point it at the below image to watch it comes to life.   Then press Wasteland Queen's face on your phone to open her mask!

 ** A Note to International Buyers **  

Please be aware that shipping charges do not include any VAT taxes/custom duties that may be applicable in your country.

Risks and challenges

All the interactive features of the AR app have been tested and are fully functionally. The only task that remains is to finish the art, animation and hidden secrets for the book. This will be our second interactive AR comic funded and delivered through crowd funding. We plan carefully, purchase samples of the books before production to ensure quality products and ship comics with front and back corrugated cardboard to ensure safe delivery around the world. As the developer of the app I am easily reachable through email or the Neon Wasteland discord should you have any problems with the app. Please note it is recommended that your smart phone or tablet be purchased within the past 5 years in order to properly run the app.

story:
Hallo, ich möchte euch DERELICTS vorstellen. Eine Science Fiction Story über drei Söldner, die widerwillig für einen korrupten Politiker arbeiten. 

Mit eurer Hilfe möchte ich diesen Comic im typischen US-Heftformat in Deutschland herausbringen.

Die Entwicklung der Alcubierre'schen Warp-Technologie hat alles verändert. Sie versetzt uns in fremde Galaxien und erlaubt uns die Eroberung der Sterne. Zwar trafen wir im ganzen Universum auf intelligentes Leben, doch die Mächtigen sind noch immer mächtig, die Reichen noch immer reich und nun richtet sich die Gier der Mega-Corporations, einst auf eine im All treibende Felskugel beschränkt, auf Gefilde jenseits der Sterne.

Wir haben neue Bündnisse geschmiedet, aber das ein oder andere Mal haben wir auch furchtbar versagt. Statt unseren heimischen Boden unter uns aufzuteilen, tun wir dies nun mit den Weiten des Universums und alles nur für das liebe Geld. Allein die Sinnlosigkeit des Kapitalismus ist nicht das einzige Thema auf der Tagesordnung. Weitere Probleme tauchten am Horizont auf, als Terra von den Wogen der Konflikte zwischen den Alien-Völkern erfasst wurde. Streitigkeiten um Lebensraum, um knappe Ressourcen, religiös motivierter Völkermord und zu allem Überfluss noch die nicht enden wollende Völkerwanderung der T’Sorianer tragen das Ihre zu der besorgniserregenden Überbevölkerung auf Terra bei.

Vor diesem Hintergrund erzählt DERELICTS die actiongeladene Geschichte einer zerrütteten Truppe von Sternen-Söldnern, die an Bord ihres alten Raumers versuchen, über die Runden zu kommen. Dabei stellen sie sich lebensbedrohlichen Missionen, manövrieren durch ein ebenso tödliches Netz aus Intrigen, um am Ende einen Platz für sich im Universum zu finden. Dies ist die Geschichte hinter der Comic-Reihe DERELICTS, in deren Genuss nun auch die deutschen Fans kommen sollen. Und dazu brauche ich eure Hilfe. 

DERELICTS ist als 3-teilige Heftserie im US-Format 168 x 260 mm geplant. Das erste Heft enthält 24 Seiten. Während das Lineart für alle 24 Seiten bereits vollständig vorliegt, werden die Seiten derzeit koloriert und gelettert. 

Das offizielle Print zu DERELICTS von Ralf Singh und Nic Chapuis. Gedruckt wird es auf hochwertigem Papier im A4 Format.

FRANK MELIÉRE

Ein terranischer Veteran, Kommandant der Mansonia und Anführer des Söldnertrupps, um den es in DERELICTS geht. Frank hat anhaltend damit zu kämpfen, dass für ihn als Cyborg die Grenzen zwischen Mensch und Maschine verschwimmen. So sind große Teile seiner Vergangenheit in Finsternis gehüllt, doch er ist bestrebt Licht ins Dunkel zu bringen. Seine Implantate erlauben es ihm unter anderem, sich mit Maschinen zu verbinden, insbesondere mit Onodata, der für ihn wie ein Exokortex, eine externe Erweiterung seines Gehirns, fungieren kann.

ILKEE KR`TOV / CRICKET

Die T'Sorianerin ist Angehörige eines außerirdischen Volkes, das humanoiden Grashüpfern ähnelt. Ihre Heimatwelt T'Sor wird immer wieder von dem Volk der Tuatara angegriffen, was die beiden Spezies immer wieder aneinander geraten lässt. Ilkee ist erst seit Kurzem bei dem Söldnertrupp. Ihr Talent und ihre Aufgabe ist es, sich unbemerkt einzuschleichen. Sie ist süchtig nach Grünem Tee und jahrhunderte alten Telenovelas.

HUN’MAK

Einer der wenigen Tuatara-Überläufer, ist er ein starker aber in sich gekehrter Kraftprotz, was ungewöhnlich für ein Volk ist, dessen einziger Antrieb Zerstörungswut zu sein scheint. Tuatara sind gnadenlose Reptiloide, die schon rein auf neurologischer Ebene unfähig sind, Mitgefühl zu empfinden. Sie versklaven, erobern und nehmen sich was sie wollen mit Gewalt. Hun'Mak dagegen scheint sich nach anderen Dingen zu sehnen. Obwohl die Tuatara zu den intelligenten Alien-Völkern zählen, gehören sie nicht dem CSS, dem Zusammenschluss von Systemen intelligenter Völker an und sind diesem daher bei der Expansion in den Lyra-Sektor im Weg.

 ZINNOBER

Drachen haben die Erde erobert. Die letzten Überlebenden der Menschheit kämpfen um das blanke Überleben. Doch eines Tages bekommt die Waise Claire die Chance, das Blatt zu wenden und den Drachen einen schweren Schlag zu versetzen. Ihr Motiv ist Rache, denn die neuen Beherrscher der Erde haben vor zwanzig Jahren alles zu Asche verbrannt, was sie je geliebt hat.  

Der erste Band von Zinnober mit 100 Seiten. Der Hardcovereinband und die stabile Fadenbindung garantieren, dass dieser Comic ein Schmuckstück in eurem Regal sein wird.

Der zweite und abschließende Band von Zinnober mit 100 Seiten. Auch hier mit Hardcovereinband und der stabilen Fadenbindung, die garantieren, dass dieser Comic ein Schmuckstück in eurem Regal sein wird.

Die exklusive Noir Edition. 28 Seiten schwarz/weiß/rot, enthält das erste Kapitel von Band 2 sowie eine vollständige Cover Galerie aller US-Hefte. Dieses Heft ist streng limitiert und kann zu jedem Paket für 12€ dazu bestellt werden.

Dieses geniale Motiv stammt von Tommy Wagner (The Changer). Gedruckt wird es auf hochwertigem Papier im A4 Format.

Dieses fantastische Motiv stammt von Sarah Burrini (Das Leben ist kein Ponyhof und Nerdgirl). Gedruckt wird es auf hochwertigem Papier im A4 Format.

Dieses fabelhafte Motiv wurde gezeichnet von Gabriel (Gabo) Elias Ibarra Nuñez und koloriert von Ilaria Fella (Zinnober).Gedruckt wird es auf hochwertigem Papier im A4 Format.

Das Cover von Band 2 als hochwertiger A4 Print. Gezeichnet von Ralf Singh, mit Tusche von Cristian Docolomansky und koloriert von Nic Chapuis.

 

THE IMPURE

The Impure erzählt in vier Bänden die Geschichte eines ergebenen Soldaten in einem interstellaren Krieg, dessen Welt ins Wanken gerät und der daraufhin seine eigene Loyalität in Frage stellt. 

Der erste Band befindet sich noch in Produktion und wird im Juni fertiggestellt sein.

The Impure - Band 1: Minerva wird als hochwertiger Hardcover Band mit 100 Seiten in Farbe erscheinen. Der edle Einband und die stabile Fadenbindung machen dieses Buch zu einem absoluten Schmuckstück in eurer Sammlung.  Format: ca. 16,8 cm x 26 cm. 

Exklusiv für Kickstarter wurde ein Variant Cover produziert. Für diese Indiegogo Kampagne möchte ich diese Variante des Buches noch einmal kurz verfügbar machen. 

Das offizielle Artbook zu Band 1 wird als A5 Softcover mit 48 Seiten in Farbe erscheinen. Mit Konzept-Zeichnungen, Charakterdesigns und Auszügen aus dem Skript erhaltet ihr einen Einblick hinter die Kulissen von The Impure.

Der großartige Alexander Artin hat dieses exklusive Print für uns gefertigt. Die Drucke sind auf hochwertigen A4 Papier mit einem UV-Schutz. 

Nina Dordevic hat diese wunderschöne Illustration für uns erstellt, die es hier als exklusiven Print gibt. Die Drucke sind auf hochwertigen A4 Papier mit einem UV-Schutz.

Tatjana Segelken aka CreaFea hat für uns diese Charakter-Illustration gezeichnet, die es hier als exklusiven Print gibt, und Ilaria Fella hat sie koloriert. Die Drucke sind auf hochwertigen A4 Papier mit einem UV-Schutz.  

Eine Bleistiftzeichnung von Ralf Singh mit einem Motiv aus einem seiner Comics. Eine Figur oder ein Drache nach Wunsch. Bei den Zeichnungen handelt es sich immer um Kopfzeichnungen.

 

Yves entwickelte schon früh eine Leidenschaft für Comics. Da er in seinem späteren Berufsleben viel mit digitalen Medien zu tun hatte, beschloß er schließlich, diese beiden Welten zu verbinden und so Kunst mit Technologie zu verschmelzen. So entstand 2012 die Motion-Comic-App Mascate. Um zukünftige Projekte unter einer Marke zu vereinen gründete Yves anschließend Darconian Entertainment. Eines dieser Projekte ist nun DERELICTS, das als transmediale Erfahrung angelegt ist und in der Teile des Comics als VR-Game erlebbar sein werden.

Vor vier Jahren hat Ralf sein Studium geschmissen und sich entschieden, seiner größten Leidenschaft nachzugehen: Comics zeichnen. Seitdem hat er bei zahlreichen Verlagen in Deutschland, den USA und Italien Comics veröffentlicht.  Darunter auch sein ganz eigener Comic, Zinnober, dessen erstes Kapitel international über 8.000 mal gedruckt wurde. Mittlerweile ist Ralf auch Autor, Kolorist und Letterer mit internationaler Erfahrung in zahlreichen Genres. In Deutschland erscheinen seine Comics unter dem Label Dead Diver.

Marc lebt seine Leidenschaft für Comics als Blogger, freischaffender Journalist, Redakteur und Übersetzer aus. In seinem Portfolio finden sich Arbeiten wie Green Arrow: Das erste Jahr (Panini) oder die kontrovers diskutierte Battle Pope-Gesamtausgabe von den The Walking Dead-Schöpfern Robert Kirkman und Tony Moore (Cross Cult).

Risiken und Herausforderungen

Mit Dead Diver habe ich bereits zwei Bücher herausgebracht und damit viel Erfahrung gesammelt. Das größte Risiko besteht bei der Druckerei, denn dort können immer wieder Fehler und Probleme auftreten, welche sich außerhalb meiner Reichweite befinden. Ich plane zwar großzügig mit der angekündigten Zeit, aber dennoch können leichte Verzögerungen auftreten.
story_txt: Hallo, ich möchte euch DERELICTS vorstellen. Eine Science Fiction Story über drei Söldner, die widerwillig für einen korrupten Politiker arbeiten. Mit eurer Hilfe möchte ich diesen Comic im typischen US-Heftformat in Deutschland herausbringen.Die Entwicklung der Alcubierre'schen Warp-Technologie hat alles verändert. Sie versetzt uns in fremde Galaxien und erlaubt uns die Eroberung der Sterne. Zwar trafen wir im ganzen Universum auf intelligentes Leben, doch die Mächtigen sind noch immer mächtig, die Reichen noch immer reich und nun richtet sich die Gier der Mega-Corporations, einst auf eine im All treibende Felskugel beschränkt, auf Gefilde jenseits der Sterne.Wir haben neue Bündnisse geschmiedet, aber das ein oder andere Mal haben wir auch furchtbar versagt. Statt unseren heimischen Boden unter uns aufzuteilen, tun wir dies nun mit den Weiten des Universums und alles nur für das liebe Geld. Allein die Sinnlosigkeit des Kapitalismus ist nicht das einzige Thema auf der Tagesordnung. Weitere Probleme tauchten am Horizont auf, als Terra von den Wogen der Konflikte zwischen den Alien-Völkern erfasst wurde. Streitigkeiten um Lebensraum, um knappe Ressourcen, religiös motivierter Völkermord und zu allem Überfluss noch die nicht enden wollende Völkerwanderung der T’Sorianer tragen das Ihre zu der besorgniserregenden Überbevölkerung auf Terra bei.Vor diesem Hintergrund erzählt DERELICTS die actiongeladene Geschichte einer zerrütteten Truppe von Sternen-Söldnern, die an Bord ihres alten Raumers versuchen, über die Runden zu kommen. Dabei stellen sie sich lebensbedrohlichen Missionen, manövrieren durch ein ebenso tödliches Netz aus Intrigen, um am Ende einen Platz für sich im Universum zu finden. Dies ist die Geschichte hinter der Comic-Reihe DERELICTS, in deren Genuss nun auch die deutschen Fans kommen sollen. Und dazu brauche ich eure Hilfe. DERELICTS ist als 3-teilige Heftserie im US-Format 168 x 260 mm geplant. Das erste Heft enthält 24 Seiten. Während das Lineart für alle 24 Seiten bereits vollständig vorliegt, werden die Seiten derzeit koloriert und gelettert. Das offizielle Print zu DERELICTS von Ralf Singh und Nic Chapuis. Gedruckt wird es auf hochwertigem Papier im A4 Format.FRANK MELIÉREEin terranischer Veteran, Kommandant der Mansonia und Anführer des Söldnertrupps, um den es in DERELICTS geht. Frank hat anhaltend damit zu kämpfen, dass für ihn als Cyborg die Grenzen zwischen Mensch und Maschine verschwimmen. So sind große Teile seiner Vergangenheit in Finsternis gehüllt, doch er ist bestrebt Licht ins Dunkel zu bringen. Seine Implantate erlauben es ihm unter anderem, sich mit Maschinen zu verbinden, insbesondere mit Onodata, der für ihn wie ein Exokortex, eine externe Erweiterung seines Gehirns, fungieren kann.ILKEE KR`TOV / CRICKETDie T'Sorianerin ist Angehörige eines außerirdischen Volkes, das humanoiden Grashüpfern ähnelt. Hun'Mak dagegen scheint sich nach anderen Dingen zu sehnen. story:
I’m Jeff Lafferty and I’m a comics creator.

I’ve completed all 24 pages & the cover, of the 1st issue of my original comic book - The Berserkonaut.

I'm now seeking funding to publish my comic and distribute it through comic shops all over the world.

Comics have been a passion of mine for most of my life. In the 90’s I worked for Marvel Comics, drawing books like Doom 2099, The Askani Xmen and Phoenix Resurrection. Working as a penciler in mainstream comics with inkers and colorist going over my work, I never felt like I was able to produce the quality of work that I wanted to do.

With the Berserkonaut my goal is to accomplish what I could not do twenty years ago, and put a book on the stands that is 100% percent my vision.  A book with a great story, great art and an awesome superhero you can get behind and root for.

This is my dream project, please help me bring it to life!

Here's a preview of pages 1 thru 6 of the comic ...

 

I’m trying to raise $3500 dollars.

I need a minimum of $2100 to print 2500 copies of the comic. I need a large print run because,  along with online and convention sales, I’m planning on distributing the books through ‘Diamond Comics Distributor’ to reach as many retail comic shops as possible.

I’m also planning on sending a free promotional comic to 300 indie friendly comic shops in an attempt to boost the orders through the distributor and get shop owners excited about the comic, that’s going to cost roughly another $1000 dollars. That leaves me with about $400 dollars to spend on shipping and art supplies.

The budget is tight, but if I can reach the $3500 funding goal, I know I can make this book happen!

Help make The Berserkonaut, a real comic book on the shelf at your local comic shop.

Pledge to back this project and if we reach our funding goal, you will receive awesome perks depending on the level of your pledge.

  • First and foremost everyone who pledges receives the 24 page, full color Berserkonaut comic book. 
  • $20 backers receive a autographed copy of the comic.
  • $35 backers receive an autographed comic with a head sketch of one of the characters on the inside front cover 
  • $150 backers receive the signed comic with a piece of original hand painted art from the comic. These are the actual painted panels that make up pages of the book. The original art from the book is limited so pledge early to get the piece you want!
  • $200 backers receive the signed comic, and a original painting of your favorite superhero, painted by me in the style of the Berserkonaut comic.
  • $400 This is the big one One lucky backer gets the original painted cover art, along with a signed comic. There's only one cover so once it's gone, it's gone

Check out some of the original art available at the $150 dollar level below

If you can't contribute, you can still help. Spread the word on your own social media channels, like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Youtube!

story:
_______________________________________________________________

In the unforgiving Wild West,

a tormented creature could be the key

to a broken man's salvation.

_______________________________________________________________

 

 

Overview

Octopus Cowboy Book 1 is the first installment in an ongoing series, a 100+ page, full color, perfect bound graphic novel written and illustrated by Jason Orfalas. The purpose of this crowdfunding campaign is to get this book out there directly to be enjoyed by readers. Your contribution would help pay for printing and fulfilment.

 

 

 

Story

Slade is a highly evolved pacific octopus endowed with an intelligent spirit. Captured by humans and taken miles away from the ocean...

 

...he is forced to fight in a vicious bloodsport where animals are pitted against each other for entertainment.

 

 

His captor and caretaker is ex-fighter Charlie Knox, a heavy-handed broken man and killer, exploiting animals to make a living.

 

 

After what should've been a highly profitable match, Charlie is cheated out of his payment.

Now he has no choice but to return to the town where he fell from grace and risk it all in a high-stakes bout that Slade can't possibly win.

 

 

 

Main Cover

Into Battle

The official cover to Octopus Cowboy Book 1. Slade with his trusty steed Casey, his guide and companion to a strange world beyond his own. Available in the following tiers: Once Upon a Time in the West, Westworld (digital), A Fistful of Dollars, and The Wild Bunch retail pack.

 

Variant A

Come and Get It

One of the earliest artworks ever produced, the fully-realised concept that is Octopus Cowboy. Available in Once Upon a Time in the West and A Few Dollars More.

 

Variant B

The Trio

This cover includes Slade and supporting characters Leopold and Kilroy. This variant is available in the tiers Once Upon a Time in the West and The Good the Bad and The Ugly.

 

 

 

Art That Serves The Story

Interiors, Inks, and Sketches

 

In Progress...

 

Here's a snapshot of the entire book so far. Presented at low resolution to avoid spoilers.

 

 

 

Production

As a professional of over 25 years in comics, advertising, film, and the toy industry, I will be producing the book myself of which I have experience in every stage.

 

 

 

Original Art

Get the ultimate collectible!

 

Octopus Cowboy Book 1 Pencils by Jason Orfalas, Bristol, 11"x17".

Page 6

 

 

Octopus Cowboy Book 1 Pencils by Jason Orfalas, Bristol, 11"x17".

Page 7

 

Octopus Cowboy Book 1 Pencils by Jason Orfalas, Bristol, 11"x17".

Page 8

 

 

Shipping and Handling

The following items will be shipped securely in Gemini Comic Flash Mailers.

 

International Backers please be aware that import fees may apply depending on your location.. Taxes and duties are to be paid by the receiver, if any.

 

Collectibles

 

'First!' Sticker

2" x 2"

Where it all started. This sticker sports the first ever artwork of Octopus Cowboy at the center.

'Prizefighters' Trading Cards

2.5" x 3.5"

Octopus Cowboy's three main characters!

'Think Fast' Bookmark

2" x 6"

 

Risks & Challenges

I have minimised the risk to my backers as much as I can by working over a year in advance before even announcing this campaign.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Consider sharing this campaign to your friends. It would be a big help. Thank you!
